about-me.HEADLINE: About me
about-me.TEXTBOX: Hi, i am Fabian Maier-Kumpukkattu, ein Frontend Entwickler. Schon immer fasziniert mich, wie Code komplexe Probleme in einfache, effiziente Lösungen verwandelt. Dabei sehe ich jede Herausforderung als Chance, meine Fähigkeiten zu verbessern und nach der eleganten Lösung zu streben. Dabei bin ich stets auf der Suche nach neuen Herausforderungen, um mein Wissen und meine Fähigkeiten kontinuierlich weiterzuentwickeln.

skills.HEADLINE: Skill set
skills.TEXTBOX: Through various projects, I have gained extensive experience with a wide range of frontend technologies. At the same time, I am always motivated to learn new technologies in order to continuously develop myself further.

projects.HEADLINE: Projects
projects.TEXTBOX: Discover a selection of my projects here and interact with them to get a comprehensive insight into my skills as a frontend developer.

contact.HEADLINE: Ready to work together?
contact.TEXTBOX: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Express confidence in your ability to make a meaningful contribution to a team through your expertise and enthusiasm for improving your skills. Show interest in contributing to a new project, while highlighting the value and skills you can bring to the table.
contact.INPUT-NAME-ERROR: Oops! it seems your name is missing
contact.INPUT-MESSAGE-ERROR: What do you need to develop?
contact.PRIVACY_VERIFICATION-LAST-PART: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
